name: MaryOnlyNeedsOranges
tagline: A modern version of the classic Snake game
body: ### Plans Release on Linux and Android when the time will allow it ### Release You can find the latest release here ### Tips You can press "P" to pause the gameplay and Space to make the game run faster. ### Details You can find the release file and the code on the github page. ### Reports If you find anything wrong with the game or if you have any ideas related to the game you can contact me at danyhk94@gmail.com ### Bugs and Fixes ``` v1.0 : First release. No bugs reported ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
